channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 18:05 Air alarm to the Chernihiv region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 18:05 Air alarm to the Chernihiv region follow the following messages.#Chernihiv_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 17:50 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 17:50 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
